trans-unit.target: 「抛下你的回忆，拥抱重生。」 ～《银蚀圣典》106片27段

trans-unit.source: Mishra's Bauble
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉的饰品

trans-unit.resname: IMA·221 | Mishra's Bauble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：检视目标牌手的牌库顶牌。在下回合维持开始时抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ."\n—Heidar, Rimewind master
trans-unit.target: 「阿肯真是爱唠叨的蠢材！非瑞克西亚的技术是上天送来的宝贵礼物。比如这精致的饰品. . .」 ～霜风会首领亥达

trans-unit.source: Moonglove Extract
trans-unit.target: 月地黄精粹

trans-unit.resname: IMA·222 | Moonglove Extract | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：它对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.
trans-unit.target: 若经稀释，月地黄可以侵蚀生体组织。若经萃取，只须一滴便可毒杀巨人。

trans-unit.source: Oblivion Stone
trans-unit.target: 遗忘石

trans-unit.resname: IMA·223 | Oblivion Stone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent.\n{5}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：在目标永久物上放置一个命运指示物。 {5}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭所有其上没有命运指示物的非地永久物，然后移去所有永久物上的所有命运指示物。

trans-unit.source: Palladium Myr
trans-unit.target: 钯秘耳

trans-unit.resname: IMA·224 | Palladium Myr | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{C}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The myr are like the Glimmervoid: blank canvases on which to build grand creations.
trans-unit.target: 此秘耳一如烁光荒野：一片空白的画布，却将用来建构伟大的造物。

trans-unit.source: Pristine Talisman

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate."\n—Elspeth Tirel
trans-unit.target: 「工具与工匠可能会毁灭，但创作此行为将生生不息。」 ～艾紫培提瑞

trans-unit.source: Runed Servitor
trans-unit.target: 符文随侍

trans-unit.resname: IMA·226 | Runed Servitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
trans-unit.target: 塔帖立遗迹让学者思索数百年却找不到解答。其秘密一直就躲在个刻着符文的头里面。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一位对手。若该牌手的手牌数量比你多，则抓等同于该差距数量的牌。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\nAny time you could mulligan and CARDNAME is in your hand, you may exile all the cards from your hand, then draw that many cards. (You can do this in addition to taking mulligans.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。 如果你处于能够再调度的时机，且CARDNAME在你手上，你可以放逐你手上的所有牌，然后抓等量的牌。（你除了再调度之外，也可以如此作。）

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加一点法术力到你的法术力池中，其颜色为由你操控的基本地能产生之任一颜色。

trans-unit.source: It doesn't point north. It points home.
trans-unit.target: 它并不指引北方。它指引着家乡。

trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature attacks, defending player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card. The creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card revealed this way. That player puts the revealed cards into his or her graveyard.\nEquip {2}
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物攻击时，防御牌手从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张地牌为止。每以此法展示一张牌，该生物便得+1/+0直到回合结束。该牌手将所展示的牌置入其坟墓场。 佩带{2}
